transfer.title: Transfer
transfer.description: Data set defined in Lianlian Pay bank partner's system to describe a transaction related to host's member account

functionType.description:
function type, one of: 

| Code | Description |
|------|-------------|
| initiate | Initiate a transaction |
| return | Return a transaction |

transferType.description:
Transfer type, one of:

| Code | Description |
|------|-------------|
| 1 | Credit member account for fund in transit |
| 2 | Credit member account for marketing fund |
| 3 | Debit member account to the platform's commission account |

oldTransferId.description: Original transferId, mandatory if the functionType = return

payChannelType.description:
Mandatory only if transactionType = 1 & functionType = initiate

Acquirer, one of:

| Code | Description |
|------|-------------|
| 0001 | Wechat |
| 0002 | Alipay |

payChannelAssignMerNo.description:
Mandatory only if transactionType = 1 & functionType = initiate

Merchant number assigned to platform in acquirer's system

payChannelTranSeqNo.description:
Mandatory only if transactionType = 1 & functionType = initiate

Transaction number in acquirer's system

status.description:
Status, one of:

| Code | Description |
|------|-------------|
| 0 | Success |
| 1 | Failed |
| 2 | In progress |
